snippet.title: Frostpunk 2 | Gameplay Deep Dive
snippet.description:
#Frostpunk 2 Beta featuring a part of sandbox mode called the Utopia Builder Preview is live now until April 22!

Pre-order Deluxe Edition now at -10% and get access to the Beta: http://steam.gs/l/p1jlh/youtube-trailer-beta

Delve deeper into the game with a new developer commentary video, where Frostpunk 2's co-directors provide valuable insights into the game's major changes and an extended gameplay preview.

While Frostpunk 2 is significantly larger in scale than the original game in every aspect, this Preview offers a glimpse of approximately 20 percent of the full experience awaiting players upon the game's release on July 25, 2024, on PC and via PC Game Pass. Anticipate additional factions, expansive maps and colonies, increased exploration, dramatic occurrences, and a robust narrative campaign mode. The game will also become available on consoles at a later date and will be included with Xbox Game Pass.
